languages.text: "Чтобы не быть голословным, я первый протяну вам руку — как жест доброй воли. Безвозмездный подарок династии фон Валанциус. Вы найдете его в лучах Марциана, изумр-р-руд, стиснутый в объятиях штор-р-рма. Держите путь нал...во, на...аво, и д...жды... ер...д, тогда..."

traits.locale_text: "Чтобы не быть баснословным, я первый протяну вам руку — как жест доброй воли. Безвозмездный подарок династии фон Валанциус. Вы найдете его средь Звезд Марциана, изумр-р-руд, стиснутый в объятия штор-р-рма. Держите путь нал...во, на...аво, и д...жды... ер...д, тогда..."

languages.text: "To assure you of my sincerity, I shall be the first to extend my hand in a gesture of goodwill. A gratuitous gift to the von Valancius dynasty. You will find it in the rays of Martianus, an emer-rald clutched in the stor-rm's embr-race. Head le... t, ri... t, and ...wice fo... d, then..."
languages.original_text: "Чтобы не быть голословным, я первый протяну вам руку — как жест доброй воли. Безвозмездный подарок династии фон Валанциус. Вы найдете его в лучах Марциана, изумр-р-руд, стиснутый в объятиях штор-р-рма. Держите путь нал...во, на...аво, и д...жды... ер...д, тогда..."

traits.locale_text: "To assure you, my offer is not vain; I will be the first to extend my hand in a gesture of goodwill. A gratuitous gift to the von Valancius dynasty. You will find it in the rays of Martianus, an emer-rald clutched in the stor-rm's embr-race. Head le... t, ri... t, and ...wice fo... d, then..."

"To assure you my offer is not just words, I will be the first to extend my hand in gesture of goodwill. A gratuitous gift to the von Valancius dynasty. You will find it among the Stars of Martianus, an emer-rald clutched in the stor-rm's embr-race. Head le... t, ri... t, and fo... d ...wice, then..."

"To assure you of my sincerity, I shall be the first to extend my hand in a gesture of goodwill. A gratuitous gift to the von Valancius dynasty. You will find it in the rays of Martianus, an emer-rald clutched in the stor-rm's embr-race. Head le... t, ri... t, and ...wice fo... d, then..."

"To assure you my offer is not vain, I will be the first to extend my hand in gesture of goodwill. A gratuitous gift to the von Valancius dynasty. You will find it among the Stars of Martianus, an emer-rald clutched in the stor-rm's embr-race. Head le... t, ri... t, and ...wice fo... d, then..."

"To assure you, my offer is not vain; I will be the first to extend my hand in a gesture of goodwill. A gratuitous gift to the von Valancius dynasty. You will find it in the rays of Martianus, an emer-rald clutched in the stor-rm's embr-race. Head le... t, ri... t, and ...wice fo... d, then..."

"To assure you of my sincerity, I shall be the first to extend my hand in a gesture of goodwill. A gratuitous gift to the von Valancius dynasty. You will find it in the rays of Martianus, an emer-rald clutched in the stor-rm's embr-race. Head le... t, ri... t, and ...wice fo... d, then..."

languages.text: “为了向您证明我的恳切，我愿意向您提供信息，代表我们的好意。这是我们送给冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的礼物。您可以在马提亚努斯的辉光之中找到那件礼物，那颗翡……包裹在暴……雨的怀抱……前往……左……右……两次……之后……”
languages.original_text: "To assure you of my sincerity, I shall be the first to extend my hand in a gesture of goodwill. A gratuitous gift to the von Valancius dynasty. You will find it in the rays of Martianus, an emer-rald clutched in the stor-rm's embr-race. Head le... t, ri... t, and ...wice fo... d, then..."

traits.locale_text: “为了向您证明我的恳切，我愿意向您提供信息，代表我们的好意。这是我们送给冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的礼物。您可以在马提亚努斯的辉光之中找到那件礼物，那颗翡……包裹在暴……雨的怀抱……前往……左……右……两次……之后……”

languages.text: « Pour vous prouver ma sincérité, je vais vous tendre la main le premier et offrir un présent à la dynastie von Valancius. Vous le trouverez parmi les lumières de Martianus, une émer-raude envelop-pée par la temp-pête. Dirigez-v... che, dr...e, et d...x f...is en a...nt, puis... »
languages.original_text: "To assure you of my sincerity, I shall be the first to extend my hand in a gesture of goodwill. A gratuitous gift to the von Valancius dynasty. You will find it in the rays of Martianus, an emer-rald clutched in the stor-rm's embr-race. Head le... t, ri... t, and ...wice fo... d, then..."

traits.locale_text: « Pour vous prouver ma sincérité, je vais vous tendre la main le premier et offrir un présent à la dynastie von Valancius. Vous le trouverez parmi les lumières de Martianus, une émer-raude envelop-pée par la temp-pête. Dirigez-v... che, dr...e, et d...x f...is en a...nt, puis... »

languages.text: «Para que confíe en mi sinceridad, seré el primero en extenderle mi mano como gesto de buena voluntad. Un regalo generoso para la dinastía von Valancius. Lo encontrará entre los rayos de Martianus, una esmer-alda envuelta en una torm-enta. Diríjase a la iz... da, de... cha y d... s ve... es por el b... en, luego...».
languages.original_text: "To assure you of my sincerity, I shall be the first to extend my hand in a gesture of goodwill. A gratuitous gift to the von Valancius dynasty. You will find it in the rays of Martianus, an emer-rald clutched in the stor-rm's embr-race. Head le... t, ri... t, and ...wice fo... d, then..."

traits.locale_text: «Para que confíe en mi sinceridad, seré el primero en extenderle mi mano como gesto de buena voluntad. Un regalo generoso para la dinastía von Valancius. Lo encontrará entre los rayos de Martianus, una esmer-alda envuelta en una torm-enta. Diríjase a la iz... da, de... cha y d... s ve... es por el b... en, luego...».

languages.text: 「私の申し出が無駄でないことを保証するために、親善の証として最初に手を差し伸べましょう。フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝に無償の贈り物を。それがマルティアヌスの星の中にある、嵐に抱かれたエメラルドです。そう…すれば…二度と…それから…」
languages.original_text: "To assure you my offer is not vain, I will be the first to extend my hand in gesture of goodwill. A gratuitous gift to the von Valancius dynasty. You will find it among the Stars of Martianus, an emer-rald clutched in the stor-rm's embr-race. Head le... t, ri... t, and ...wice fo... d, then..."

traits.locale_text: 「私の申し出が無駄でないことを保証するために、親善の証として最初に手を差し伸べましょう。フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝に無償の贈り物を。それがマルティアヌスの星の中にある、嵐に抱かれたエメラルドです。そう…すれば…二度と…それから…」

languages.text: "Um meine Aufrichtigkeit zu beweisen, werde ich meine Hand ausstrecken, als Geste des guten Willens. Ein Geschenk an die Dynastie von Valancius. Ihr findet es in den Strahlen von Martianus – ein Smar-ragd, gefangen in der Umar-rmung des Stur-rms. Reist nach lin... s, rech... s und ...zweimal nach vo..., dann ..."
languages.original_text: "To assure you of my sincerity, I shall be the first to extend my hand in a gesture of goodwill. A gratuitous gift to the von Valancius dynasty. You will find it in the rays of Martianus, an emer-rald clutched in the stor-rm's embr-race. Head le... t, ri... t, and ...wice fo... d, then..."

traits.locale_text: "Um meine Aufrichtigkeit zu beweisen, werde ich meine Hand ausstrecken, als Geste des guten Willens. Ein Geschenk an die Dynastie von Valancius. Ihr findet es in den Strahlen von Martianus – ein Smar-ragd, gefangen in der Umar-rmung des Stur-rms. Reist nach lin... s, rech... s und ...zweimal nach vo..., dann ..."

languages.text: "Samimiyetimi göstermek adına von Valancius hanedanlığına minnettarlığımızı simgeleyen bir armağanla iyi niyetimi sergilemek isterim. Martianus ışınlarında saklı bu armağan. Fır... Tınanın... Or... Tasında... Bir ye... Şim. Önce sol... So... Ra sa... Ve ik... Kez ile... Gidip..."
languages.original_text: "To assure you of my sincerity, I shall be the first to extend my hand in a gesture of goodwill. A gratuitous gift to the von Valancius dynasty. You will find it in the rays of Martianus, an emer-rald clutched in the stor-rm's embr-race. Head le... t, ri... t, and ...wice fo... d, then..."

traits.locale_text: "Samimiyetimi göstermek adına von Valancius hanedanlığına minnettarlığımızı simgeleyen bir armağanla iyi niyetimi sergilemek isterim. Martianus ışınlarında saklı bu armağan. Fır... Tınanın... Or... Tasında... Bir ye... Şim. Önce sol... So... Ra sa... Ve ik... Kez ile... Gidip..."
